name: runtestcaseassociation
description: Creates links from automated tests to Azure Devops test case work items.
author: GoatWranglers

inputs.name: AZURE_PROJECT
inputs.label: Azure Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Devops project name eg. GWrangler

inputs.name: TEST_TYPE
inputs.label: Test Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional label to describe test type eg. UI

inputs.name: TEST_DLL
inputs.label: Test Assembly Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of assembly file that contains the tests eg. GoatWrangler.dll

inputs.name: MAX_MISSING_TEST_CASE_IDS
inputs.label: Max Missing Test Case Ids
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum amount of test methods that do not contain a TestCaseId attribute

inputs.name: DRY_RUN
inputs.label: Dry Run
inputs.helpMarkDown: When Dry Run is set to true, the TestCaseIds are validated in the build pipeline, but the associations in Azure Devops are not created.
